about_the_game:
Horse Farm Simulator is a chill simulation game where you can create and manage your own horse farm, while also enjoying horse riding adventures at this farm.

Assist Visitors 📈

Your amazing horse farm will be filled with visitors. You can earn money by attending to them and further grow your farm. Some customers may want to ride your horses, so be ready to offer them a horse riding experience.

Horse Riding 🐎

Tired of taking care of the farm? Then take your favorite horse out of the stable and go for a wonderful ride in the forest. Riding a horse will make you feel great and relieve all your tiredness.

Grow 🆙

If your horse farm is starting to feel small, you can expand it even further. Your farm will be the largest and most magnificent horse farm in town.

Customize Horses 📌

Attach horseshoes and give them names. Form a bond with your horses. Establishing an emotional connection with horses is extremely valuable. Additionally, you can paint them in different colors if you wish.

Horse Racing And Auction 🥇

You need to provide special training sessions to the horses you want to enter in races to increase their speed. If they achieve good results in races, not only will your horse's name become known, but you'll also earn money. Additionally, successful horses can be sold at high prices in auctions.

Horse Farm Simulator will teach you how enjoyable it is to care for horses. Are you ready to expand your horse farm and spend quality time with the horses?

  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
